titleInfo.title: 'Landing at foot of Salt Hills [Qishm].' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:102 x 148 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘16’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of Lord Curzon’s party being carried onshore on Qishm Island, at the foot of the salt hills. A small rowing boat is pulled up almost to the shore at left. Seven men stand on shore up the beach at centre, some of whom appear to be preparing a bath chair. A small dog runs along the shore at left.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Landing at foot of Salt Hills.’Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘16’Pencil, upper left, alongside image: ‘b’
